biotools.summary: Computer program for phylogenetic analysis. Its analytical strength is in studies of character evolution. It also provides many tools for entering and editing data and phylogenies, and for producing tree diagrams and charts.

bioschemas.name: MacClade
bioschemas.summary: Computer program for phylogenetic analysis. Its analytical strength is in studies of character evolution. It also provides many tools for entering and editing data and phylogenies, and for producing tree diagrams and charts.
